name: VR Jurassic Kingdom Tour
description:
Enjoy a Jurassic RollerCoaster train ride filled with tons of animated dinos made for VR glasses. You can find dinosaurs like Triceratops, Stegosaurus, Brontosaurus, Raptors: Velociraptors, T-Rex: Tyrannosaurus Rex and others in dinos world. All dinosaur models have unique realistic sounds and animations. VR Jurassic Kingdom Tour is 2 minutes and 30 seconds long relaxing Jurassic World train ride that will blow your mind.

No remote control or Bluetooth controller needed since you control everything by rotating your head.

Note #1: This VR RollerCoaster requires a VR headset like Google Cardboard for best results.

Note #2: This VR game was made for high-end phones with a gyroscope. It may work on older phones, but you will experience a lower refresh rate.

If you like VR Jurassic Kingdom Tour, please give it a rate and a review.
